attributes.action: Close any loopholes in the hunting legislation and enforce it rigoursly.Stop this animal cruelty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want the government to completely enforce the hunting act.Tearing an animal to part in the name of sport is antiquated and completely barbaric.I think these animals are an important part of the british countryside and add to it's beauty.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
